anti_patterns.fix: Check requiresSkills field and include all dependencies when assigning skills to agents

anti_patterns.name: Duplicate Skill Implementations
anti_patterns.problem: Creating project-specific versions of Factory-provided skills instead of using factoryPattern templates
anti_patterns.fix: Use factoryPattern paths to generate skill implementations. Only create custom skills for truly unique requirements

anti_patterns.name: Orphaned Skill References
anti_patterns.problem: Referencing skills in agents or blueprints that don't exist in skill-catalog.json breaks validation and discovery
anti_patterns.fix: Always add new skills to skill-catalog.json before referencing them. Use catalog as single source of truth

anti_patterns.name: Category Misclassification
anti_patterns.problem: Placing skills in wrong categories makes discovery difficult and breaks category-based filtering
anti_patterns.fix: Follow existing category definitions. When in doubt, use 'core' for generic skills, 'workflow' for process skills
